title: I'm in love with a man for years, now I'm earning, can I send the proposal? #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: uh so um I will explain to you the context uh so I'm in love I have been in love with the guy from Morocco uh for approximately six years and he's living in the countryside and I'm living in France uh so now uh I'm earning alhamdulillah and so I was uh wondering if it's permissible if I ask parents if my dad ask his parents uh for marriage and then you will change I don't understand your question what is the relationship between you earning and your dad asking his parents for permission yeah you want to change shoes and you become the groom and he becomes a bride I don't understand yeah okay listen listen to me daughter Amina six years is a lot of time and if he's not man enough to work to earn to gain the trust of your father and to propose to your father he's not a man I'm sorry to be blunt but this is what I do for living counseling sessions people come to me because they want to hear the truth not to be sugarcoated and not to be pampered six years in a relationship Allah is angry with you Allah is not pleased with what you're doing because you are communicating you're engaging Allah knows in what that I would not go into details but Allah is not pleased with you after all these three six years he's not earning and you're the one who's working and mixing with Haram uh um men and doing whatever you're doing Allah knows I'm not going go to details still you want to propose to his parents which they may accept and they may reject and humiliate you and when you get married he sits home playing with his PlayStation 4 while you work and pay the bills and the rent and the food this is not natural unless you have a patch on your eye and a hook hand and a wooden leg and your name is Black Beard the pirate why would you wait for such a guy who's not a real man give me a break he's not the last man on Earth so have dignity have K and have Islam and look for what benefits you and gets you closer to Allah may Allah make things easy
